availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p:
Campbell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Murnan. Married to
Owned one enslaved person in 1850 in Campbell County.
Residence: Campbell County, Kentucky. A Kentucky-born farmer. Son of John and Elizabeth Murnan. Married Elizabeth Weir.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, p. 889
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, 2nd District, p. 148.
